Standards 
INTEGRATED MANAGEMENT OF PREGNANCY AND CHILDBIRTH (IMPAC)
Requirements
	 A 	national	policy	and	locally	adapted	guidelines	on	the	prevention	and	
management	of	STIs/RTIs	are	available	and	are	correctly	implemented.
